text: Gumazamizir maba kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Bizitam nan suirazir puvatɨ, kamaghɨn kɨ biziba bar dar amuam.” A guizbangɨra, egh nɨ uaghan nɨghnɨgh, bizir maba nɨn dabirabimɨn akurvazir puvatɨ. Guizbangɨra, kɨ fɨrighɨrɨgh biziba bar dar amuam. Eghtɨ bizitam na damightɨ, kɨ an ingangarir gumazimɨn mɨn ikian kogham.
